meanings.definition: To have as belonging to one; own.
meanings.sent2: He possesses a rare coin collection.
meanings.sent3: The cat possesses the comfiest spot on the couch.
meanings.sent4: His smile possesses a contagious joy.
meanings.sent5: The old house possesses a mysterious aura.

meanings.definition: To have as a characteristic, quality, or attribute.
meanings.sent2: Her voice possesses a soothing tone.
meanings.sent3: His jokes possess a unique humor.
meanings.sent4: The mountain possesses an imposing presence.
meanings.sent5: The flower possesses a delicate fragrance.

meanings.definition: To have in one's power or control.
meanings.sent3: The villain possesses a devious plan.
meanings.sent5: The teacher possesses knowledge that inspires.
